description: Enterprise techniques used by Forfiles, ATT&CK software S0193 v1.0
name: Forfiles (S0193)

techniques.comment: Forfiles can be used to act on (ex: copy, move, etc.) files/directories in a system during (ex: copy files into a staging area before).[4]
Forfiles can be used to locate certain types of files/directories in a system.(ex: locate all files with a specific extension, name, and/or age)[4]
Forfiles can be used to subvert controls and possibly conceal command execution by not directly invoking cmd.[2][3]
